name: Nidhogg Clone
description:
Keyboard:

  • arrow keys -> movement
  • space -> jump
  • z -> throwing
  • x -> stab
  • c -> attack (combo) or punch
  • q, a -> stab position cycle (press before stab)
  • down and forward -> slide

Gamepad

  • d-pad -> movement
  • a -> jump
  • b -> throwing
  • x -> stab
  • y -> attack (combo) or punch
  • right analog (up down) -> stab position cycle (move it before stab)
  • down and forward -> slide
  • jump and attack -> aerial attack

Note:

  • slide to get the weapon
  • punch or do aerial attack for drop enemy weapon
  • and there are some bugs, i apologize
